akn:section.akn:heading: Sanctions exception relating to importation of goods

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 10261. Sanctions exception relating to importation of goods(a) In generalThe authorities and requirements to impose sanctions under this chapter shall not include the authority or requirement to impose sanctions on the importation of goods.
(b) Good definedIn this section, the term “good” means any article, natural or man-made substance, material, supply, or manufactured product, including inspection and test equipment, and excluding technical data.
(Pub. L. 117–263, div. E, title LV, § 5579, Dec. 23, 2022, 136 Stat. 3370.)
(a) In general The authorities and requirements to impose sanctions under this chapter shall not include the authority or requirement to impose sanctions on the importation of goods.

(b) Good defined In this section, the term “good” means any article, natural or man-made substance, material, supply, or manufactured product, including inspection and test equipment, and excluding technical data.
